name: Tile Defense
description:
Created solo in 3 days for ScoreSpace Jam #14 with the theme "Merging" and the optional theme "time trial"

The goal of the game is to merge your tiles to score some point and shoot bullets (and other kinds of dangerous things) to kill the bad tiles trying to ruin your high score.

You can compete on the best score or on the best timed score (your score divided by your timer).

Musics

  • Beauty Flow by Kevin Macleod
  • Raving Energy by Kevin Macleod

Sounds (freesound.org)

  • 8-Bit Gun 2_2 by Joao_Janz
  • Retro_Explosion_05 by MATRIXXX_
  • Explosion 2 8 Bit by Mrthenoronha
  • Impact noise - Cartridge onto console and Plastic Box 12 by NicJonesAudio
  • Breaking Glass 09 by CBJ_Student
  • Menu click (hat) by kickhat
  • Power Up 2 SFX by Eschwabe3

Fonts

  • Bulky Pixels by John Bloor
